statements: SELECT customer_name, customer_age FROM customers WHERE customer_gender='Male'
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC
SELECT customer_name, customer_gender FROM customers WHERE customer_age > 30 ORDER BY customer_age ASC
SELECT customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_age BETWEEN 25 AND 35
SELECT customer_name, customer_gender FROM customers
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_age > 30 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_gender FROM customers WHERE customer_age BETWEEN 25 AND 40;
SELECT customer_name, customer_age FROM customers WHERE customer_gender = 'Male' ORDER BY customer_age ASC;
SELECT customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'J%' AND customer_gender = 'Female';
SELECT customer_name, customer_age, customer_gender FROM customers ORDER BY customer_age DESC, customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT user_id, username, age, gender FROM Users ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT username, age FROM Users WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE price > 100;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(order_id) FROM Orders GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(order_id) >= 3;
SELECT user_id, username, age, gender FROM Users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, age, gender FROM Users JOIN Orders ON Users.user_id = Orders.user_id WHERE Orders.price > 100 ORDER BY Orders.price ASC;

SELECT user_id, username, age, gender, product_name, quantity, price FROM Users JOIN Orders ON Users.user_id = Orders.user_id WHERE username LIKE 'John%' AND gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age ASC, price DESC;
SELECT product_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM Orders GROUP BY product_name HAVING total_quantity > 50 ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(order_id) AS total_orders FROM Orders GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_orders > 2 ORDER BY total_orders DESC, user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, age FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT user_id, username, gender FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE price < 50.00;
SELECT user_id, product_name, timestamp FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'view' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, age, gender FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, product_name, price FROM users JOIN purchases ON users.user_id = purchases.user_id WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT u.username, p.product_name, i.interaction_type FROM users u JOIN purchases p ON u.user_id = p.user_id JOIN interactions i ON u.user_id = i.user_id WHERE i.product_id = 5;
SELECT username, interaction_type, timestamp FROM users JOIN interactions ON users.user_id = interactions.user_id WHERE interaction_type = 'like' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(purchase_id) AS total_purchases FROM users JOIN purchases ON users.user_id = purchases.user_id GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_purchases > 2 ORDER BY total_purchases DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE age > 25;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT order_id, user_id, product_id, quantity, order_date FROM orders WHERE quantity > 1 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM users
SELECT username, age FROM users ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price ASC
SELECT users.username, products.product_name, orders.quantity FROM users JOIN orders ON users.user_id = orders.user_id JOIN products ON orders.product_id = products.product_id
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, age FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM orders GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, preference, rating FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT user_id, preference, rating FROM user_preferences WHERE rating > 4.5 ORDER BY user_id, preference;
SELECT user_id, username, age FROM users LEFT JOIN user_preferences ON users.user_id = user_preferences.user_id WHERE preference = 'Music';
